events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to your candidacy for further communication.
Your profile passed the initial screening stage; the recruiter was impressed with your background and will proceed with scheduling interviews.
You replied promptly to the recruiter's message, expressing enthusiasm about the next steps and potential fit for the software engineer role.
The technical interview has been successfully scheduled for May 10th at 14:00 UTC to assess your software development skills.
